BBCreateView - Class in controlPanel
BB Create View is designed to allow users to create a Billboard by selecting the billboard name, title, text and picture.
BBCreateView() - Constructor for class controlPanel.BBCreateView
Constructor to set up JFrame with provided name and create GUI components Set ENUM value allowing use in Controller Class
BBCreateView.PhotoType - Enum in controlPanel
Type of photo provided by user either url or data
BBFullPreview - Class in controlPanel
Preview the full Billboard from the BBCreateView or the BBListView, this shows the Billboard as it would be on the Viewer.
BBFullPreview() - Constructor for class controlPanel.BBFullPreview
 
BBListView - Class in controlPanel
List of Billboards allowing user with valid permissions to Edit, Delete or View billboards.
BBListView() - Constructor for class controlPanel.BBListView
Constructor to set up JFrame with provided name and create GUI components Set ENUM value allowing use in Controller Class
BBMenuView - Class in controlPanel
Menu for navigating to the Billboard list or Billboard create/update view.

Constructor to set up JFrame with provided name and create GUI components Set ENUM value allowing use in Controller Class
BillboardAdmin - Class in server
The BillboardAdmin contains methods which interacts with the server and database when working with the Billboard Table.
BillboardAdmin() - Constructor for class server.BillboardAdmin
 
BillboardControl - Class in controlPanel
The BillboardControl contains on the communication methods between the Control Panel to the server for Billboard Methods.
BillboardControl() - Constructor for class controlPanel.BillboardControl
 
BillboardList - Class in server
The BillboardList is a class which is used as an serializable object to send billboard list to the control panel from the database result
BillboardList(String, ArrayList<String>) - Constructor for class server.BillboardList
